short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chess is a two-player strategy board game played on a chessboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chess is a two-player strategy board game played on a chessboard, a square checkered gameboard with 64 squares arranged in an eight-by-eight grid. It is one of the world's most popular games, played by millions of people worldwide at home, in clubs, online, by correspondence, and in tournaments.
